Package com.rvandoosselaer.jmeconverter

Class Converter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rvandoosselaer.jmeconverter.Converter
  • public class Converter
extends java.lang.Object
    The main starting point of the converter. First the model is loaded using the ModelLoader. The resulting Model is then processed by the configured list of Processor. The processors are executed in the order in which they have been added to the list. The order of the processor list can be adapted by invoking the addProcessor(int, Processor), removeProcessor(Processor) and clearProcessors() methods. Make sure that processors that modify the model are processed before the BinaryWriter processor is invoked. Changes made to the model after the BinaryWriter is invoked will not be stored.
